response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value and relevance to you, estimated at $1,000,000. We are offering it to you at a special price tailored to recognize your unique appreciation for its qualities. Our proposal is to extend this opportunity to you at $950,000. We believe this is a fair and advantageous offer that allows us to share the value of this product with you while maximizing our return on investment. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
